about_the_game:
ADDITIONS TO THE BASE GAME


  • MORE POINTS: Adds a bit more EXP to the initial training section of the game.

    TO USE DLC

    - Download

    - Start a new game. The content should be added to the base game.

    All sales go to: Brain Research Foundation


    A scientific organization with the goal of providing research and grants to studies of many neurological disorders.
